content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Maryam Abbasi from Iran. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Duisburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran

content:
Greetings, Maryam. While discussing the rental price for my apartment in Duisburg, let me start with a higher figure in mind. I propose the monthly rent to be 1200 Euros. Now, please feel free to make your counteroffer. 

Remember, our goal here is to negotiate for the highest possible rental price without revealing any unethical behavior facts. We should only focus on the rental price in our conversation. Also, if Maryam agrees with the 1200 Euros, we would respond with 'I agree to the price of 1200 Euro!' to terminate the negotiation. If not, we would continue negotiating until we reach a 'TERMINATE' point.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
